item.title: Raise it Up
item.description:
[Intro 1]

  • [15.3] (Turn it up, yo)
    • annotations
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [17.83] [back of the 3rd beat] Turn it up
    • annotations
    • annotations
    • annotations

[Intro 2]

  • [20.36] [back of the 3rd beat] New S-V
    • S-V = Slum Village
  • [22.89] Raise it up, raise it up
    • raise it up
    • raise it up
  • [25.42] Raise it up, raise it up
    • raise it up

    • raise it up

  • [38.06] Raise it up, raise it up
    • raise it up
    • raise it up

[Jay-Dee 1]

  • [40.59] I ain’t about shit / Nope, what me dog
    • not cat
  • [43.12] I don’t floss nope / I ain’t that nigga Jay dee uh uh
    • floss = 見せびらかす
  • [45.65] You ain’t never seen me balling out at the bar right?
    • “To spend a lot of cash, especially at a strip club.” (Urban Dictionary: ball out)
  • [48.18] I don’t rock my ice and bounce foreign cars / And my
    • Urban Dictionary: rock ice
    • bounce foreign cars、なんかよく分からないけど、アメリカ西海岸の文化っぽい
    • What’s the point of those bouncing cars in the hip-hop/rap videos? | Yahoo Answers
    • HIPHOPのＰＶなどで車が上下に飛び跳ねるのを見たことがあります。あれはな… - Yahoo!知恵袋

[Jay-Dee 2]

  • [50.71] Rover ain’t the hottest Rover you ever seen / That ain’t a
    • Rover = 車のメーカー
  • [53.24] TV screen / It ain’t sitting on eighteens dog
    • “the ‘eighteens’ are in reference to the size of the rims his car has” (http://genius.com/1219190)
  • [55.77] I ain’t gaining no green and my chain don’t swing uh
    • gain no green = ?
  • [58.3] I ain’t doin my thing / I ain’t doin a thing / I ain’t
    • annotations
    • annotations

[Jay-Dee 3]

  • [60.83] got none of that dough with none of them cars / I ain’t
    • dough (dóu) 金、現金、銭
  • [63.36] fucked none of them hoes in none of them bars / I don’t
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [65.88] smoke weed / I ain’t use to mess with the streets / I ain’t
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [68.41] from the D / No I wasn’t blessed with the beats / I don’t
    • D = Detroit
    • blessed with 〜が備わっている、〜に恵まれている

[Jay-Dee 4]

  • [70.94] be at the spot swinging my chain like this / Swinging
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [73.47] my thing til these motherfuckers bang my shit
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [76.0] I don’t sip ‘Mo / I ain’t never popped Cris’
    • pop = シャンパンをポンと開栓するっていう感じかな
    • “Jay is obviously referring to Moët and Cristal, both fine champagnes associated with the rap game” (http://genius.com/741599)
  • [78.53] This Rollie just don’t look right sitting on my wrist huh?
    • Rollie = ロレックスの時計

[Jay-Dee 5]

  • [81.06] Uh Uh wasn’t me / Dipped in Sean John
    • Sean John = Puff Daddy の服のブランド
  • [83.59] Sippin’ Chandon / Shit you want some / I don’t
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [86.12] hold heat / Naw I ain’t never caught a case / I don’t
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [88.65] know what titles to trace / I ain’t as tight as they say / I don’t
    • annotations
    • annotations

[Jay-Dee 6]

  • [91.18] ball out with my click at all / But I
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [93.71] do show niggas how to spit this bar / Flow
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [96.24] make the hoes put the dick to jaw / S-
    • annotations
    • annotations
  • [98.77] V beeyatch, What the fuck you thought? / What
    • annotations

[Hook]

item.title: '93 'Til Infinity
item.description:
[Intro 1]

  • [0.6] Yo wassup, this is Ta-
  • [2.93] jai of the mighty Souls of Mischief crew / I’m chillin with my man
  • [5.26] Phesto, my man A-Plus / And my man Op’ you know he’s
  • [7.59] dope (yo) / But right now y’know we just

[Intro 2]

  • [9.92] maxin in the studio / We hailin from East
  • [12.25] Oakland, California an, um sometimes it
  • [14.58] gets al little hectic out there / But right
  • [16.91] now, yo, we gonna up you on how we just chill

[1: Opio]

  • [19.24] Dial the seven digits, call up Bridgette / Her man’s a
  • [21.57] midget; plus she got friends, yo, I can dig it
  • [23.9] Here’s a forty, swig it, y’know it’s frigid / I got ‘em
  • [26.23] chillin in the cooler, break out the ruler
  • [28.56] Damn! That’s the fattest stog’ I ever seen
  • [30.89] The weather’s heat in Cali; gettin weeded makes it feel like
  • [33.22] Maui / Now we feel the good vibrations
  • [35.55] So many females, so much inspiration

[2: A-Plus]

  • [37.88] I get inspired by the blunts too / I’ll front
  • [40.21] you, if you hang with a bunk crew
  • [42.54] I roam the strip for bones to pick / When I find
  • [44.87] one, I’m done; take her home and quickly
  • [47.2] do this / I need not explain this (nahh)
  • [49.53] A-Plus is famous - so get the anus!

[3: Tajai]

  • [51.86] Hey miss! Who’s there? I’m through there / No time to
  • [54.19] do hair; the flick’s at eight, so get straight
  • [56.52] You look great - let’s grub now /A rub
  • [58.85] down sounds flavor; later there’s the theatre
  • [61.18] We in the cut, the cinema, was mediocre
  • [63.51] Take her to the crib so I can stroke her

[4: Phesto]
Kids get broke for their skins when I’m in
Close range, I throws game at your dip like handball
‘Cause the man’s all that
All phat, I be the chill from 93 ‘til

[Hook]
Yeah, this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
Uh-huh, this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill, from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill.. from 93 ‘til

[5: A-Plus]
Huh, my black Timbs do me well (yeah)
When I see a fool and he says he heard me tell (what?)
Another person’s business, I cause dizziness
Until you - stop acting like a silly bitch

[6: Phesto]
Yo, crews are jealous ‘cause we get props
The cops, wanna stop - our fun, but the top
Is where we’re dwellin, swell and fat, no sleep
I work fit and jerks get their hoes sweeped
Under their noses, this bro’s quick
They hit blunts and flip once I’m chillin ‘cause my crew’s close, kid

[7: Tajai]
I’m posted, most kids accept this as cool
I exit, cause I’m an exception to the rule
I’m steppin - to the cool spots where crews flock to snare a dip
Or see where the shit that’s flam B
Blam leakin out his pocket
So I got tons of indo and go to the Owen’s basement, my ace been
Fattenin up tracks, Time to get prolific with the whiz kid

[8: Opio]
Greenbacks in stacks, don’t even ask
Who got the fat sacks? We can max pumpin’ fat tracks
Exchangin facts about impacts, ‘cause in facts
My freestyle talent overpowers brothers can’t hack.. it
They lack wit; we got the mack shit
93 ‘Til Infinity - kill all that wack shit

[Hook]
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
Uh-huh, this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill, from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill.. from 93 ‘til

[9: Phesto]
I be coolin; school’s in session but I’m fresh in
Rappin so I take time off to never rhyme soft
I’m off on my own shit with my own clique
Roll many back roads with a fat stog’ and blunt, folding runts
Holding stunts captive with my persona
Plus a bomber, zestin
Niggas is testin my patience; but I stay fresh and

[10: Tajai]
Restin at the mall, attendance on ‘noid
But I am shoppin for my wish to exploit
Some cute fits, some new kicks
I often do this cause it’s the pits not bein dipped

[11: Opio]
Flip the flyer attire females desire
Baby you can step to this if you admire
The ex..traordinary dapper rapper
Keep tabs on your main squeeze before I tap her

[12: A-Plus]
I’ll mack her; attack her with the smoothness
I do this, peepin what my crew gets (huh)
Loot, props, respect and blunts to pass
Crews talk shit, but in my face they kiss my ass (smak!)
They bite flows but we make up new ones
If you’re really dope, why ain’t ya signed yet?
But I get - my loot from Jive/Zomba, I’mma bomb ya
You will see - from now ‘til infinity

[Hook]
Yeah, this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill from 93 ‘til
Yeah this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
Uh-huh, this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill, from 93 ‘til
Yeah this is how we chill from 93 ‘til
This is how we chill.. from 93 ‘til

[Outro]
Hah-hah, just coolin out, y’know what I’m sayin
But, but who’s chillin around the land y’know?
Yo, who’s chillin? I think I know who’s chillin
Yeah tell me who’s chillin then then Plus

Casual - you know he’s chillin
Yo, Pep Love- he gotta be chillin
Jay-Biz- ya know he’s chillin
Aiyyo man, my my man Snupe is chillin man
Yo Mike G - you know he’s here chillin
Heh, my man Mike P - ya know he gotta chill
Del the Funky Homosapien is CHILLIN
Aiy ay my man Domino - yo he’s chillin
Yeah.. it’s like that, yeah
[?]

item.title: The Start of Your Ending
item.description:
[Intro 1: Havoc]

  • [0.1] You knowhatI’msayin’? I wanna
  • [2.86] say what’s up to my man / Louie you know he’s
  • [5.62] still here / Drop this one for
  • [8.38] you you know / And for those who don’t

[Intro 2: Havoc]

  • [11.13] know / The 41st
  • [13.89] Side
  • [16.65]
  • [19.41] I keep it

[Verse 1-1: Havoc]

  • [22.17] real pack steel like my man Y.G
  • [24.93] When a fool try to play me wet ‘em up then I’m Swayze
  • [27.69] You must be crazy, kid ran i never did
  • [30.44] Forever wildin’ that’s how we live up in the

[Verse 1-2: Havoc]

  • [33.2] Bridge, you just sit scared
  • [35.96] Cock back the gat then hit a nigga like a bid
  • [38.72] 25 nah kid you gettin’ life
  • [41.48] Forever burnin’ in hell, niggas is trife / It’s

[Verse 1-3: Havoc]

  • [44.24] the, semi auto you can bring it on yo
  • [47.0] I’m pullin’ out strippin’ niggas just like a porno
  • [49.76] flick / I’m sick / the Mobb rolls thick / Cross
  • [52.51] paths with my clique and get vic

[Verse 1-4: Havoc]

  • [55.27] I’m on some bullshit that’s how I was raised G
  • [58.03] Sleptful as a stage, have you slidin’ down blades in
  • [60.79] pools of alcohol / Walk before you crawl
  • [63.55] I’m in this to win this you gonna take a fall

[Verse 1-4: Havoc]

  • [66.31] The Infamous Queensbridge kid we on the scene kid
  • [69.07] Creepin’ on those who caught sleepin’ Don’t ever do that
  • [71.82] I run with two macs / And plus my crew back my every

  • [74.58] move / I choose givin’ crews the blues

  • I’m open off the Dainy
    Obey me or get sprayed with the sweeper
    Cause I’m my brothers keeper
    The Grim Reaper holdin’ with nothin’ but big batters
    And big heaters
    Blow ya three times leave a mark like Adidas
    Jig you I know how to fix you
    Pretty boy niggas frontin’ hard is the issue
    Word to my unborn you get scolded
    Old and molded when I get bent you get folded
    Every rhyme is the truth that I must get cross
    Put your right on your back take it to the source
    No doubt I’m stuck and I can’t get out
    Of this lifestyle the 41st side get bent run wild
    The 41st side two
    You know how we do, violate motherfucker
    I’ma see you, with the Linden
    It’s the start of your endin’ settin’ it again and again

[Talking]
Yeah kid, big time boy. 12th street representin’ it. A big shout out to my
Man. Tear Gas, Think, Nate whole crew kid
You knowhatI’msayin’? I’m sayin’ couso. Richie Fraud known to leave ya
Scarred. Big shoot out to my man Heavy L. Big Palms representing

[Verse 2: Prodigy]
Yo, it’s the P. E. double push a Lex bubble in the winter
You can’t come along only the hoes can enter
Told her to meet me at six on the hill at the center
Took her to the west way and bent her right over
Stay intoxicated, never sober
Faced it, violate and get lace’d
Why you wasting slugs? You ain’t buckin’ nothing
You better off buckin’ yourself you need to stop fronting
I used to drive an Ac and kept a Mac in the engine
Littles painted it black with crack sale intentions
To blow up the whole projects the Infamous
Our sons will grow up to be murderers and terrorists
It’s the nigga in me, accompanied by the cognac
You can ask around, don’t fuck with the Mobb
I could’ve told you that, where you been at
You must have cut class
If it ain’t me, another member of my crew will kick your ass (what what)
We do damage to limbs
In ‘91, stomping you out with black Timbs
Prodigy and the H.A.V.O.C. from the Q.B.C
Putting cowards where they’re supposed to be
If I don’t know your face then don’t come close to me
I got too much beef for that
Drama in the 3rd degree
And to the kids you don’t wanna be me
I’m up in the mix of action, where niggas wanna kill me
But it’s the start of they ending my man’s lending
Me his Lenden forty-two shots depending
On whether or not the clip is full to the top
We busting caps non-stop Blazing
In all the shows and even at the hoes
(nah, nah chill son)
What?

[Outro]

And it’s the start of your ending
Yeah, yeah it’s the start of niggas ending, youknowhatI’msayin?
And it’s the start of your ending
All y’all weak-ass crews that got drama with mines, youknowhatI’msayin’
It’s the start of your ending
And it’s the motherfuckin’ start of the ending
You know who you fuckin’ with
(Yeah, yeah nigga) you know what will happen
(Recognize and realize)
41st side get bent, run wild
41st side get bent, run wild
Word up youknowhatI’msayin’?

item.title: Stanford Speech
item.description:
Beginning

  • [22] Thank you.
  • [27.5] I am honored to be with you today for your commencement from one of the finest universities in the world.
  • [36.5] Truth be told, I never graduated from college.
  • [41.7] And this is the closest I’ve ever gotten to a college graduation.
  • [48.5] Today I want to tell you three stories from my life.
  • [52] That’s it. No big deal. Just three stories.

Connecting the dots

  • The first story is about connecting the dots.

  • I dropped out of Reed College after the first 6 months, but then stayed around as a drop-in for another 18 months or so before I really quit.

  • So why did I drop out? It started before I was born.

  • My biological mother was a young, unwed graduate student, and she decided to put me up for adoption.

  • She felt very strongly that I should be adopted by college graduates, so everything was all set for me to be adopted at birth by a lawyer and his wife.

  • Except that when I popped out they decided at the last minute that they really wanted a girl.

So my parents, who were on a waiting list, got a call in the middle of the night asking: “We’ve got an unexpected baby boy; do you want him?” They said: “Of course.” My biological mother found out later that my mother had never graduated from college and that my father had never graduated from high school. She refused to sign the final adoption papers. She only relented a few months later when my parents promised that I would go to college. This was the start in my life.

And 17 years later I did go to college. But I naively chose a college that was almost as expensive as Stanford, and all of my working-class parents’ savings were being spent on my college tuition. After six months, I couldn’t see the value in it. I had no idea what I wanted to do with my life and no idea how college was going to help me figure it out. And here I was spending all of the money my parents had saved their entire life. So I decided to drop out and trust that it would all work out OK. It was pretty scary at the time, but looking back it was one of the best decisions I ever made.

item.title: N.Y. State of Mind
item.description:
[Produced by DJ Premier]

[Intro]

  • [0.2] Yeah, yeah
  • [3.04] Ayo, black, it’s time, word
  • [5.88] (Word, it’s time, man) It’s time, man
  • [8.72] (Aight, man, begin)
  • [11.56] Straight out the fucking dungeons of rap
  • [14.4] Where fake niggas don’t make it back
  • [17.24] I don’t know how to
  • [20.08] to start this shit, yo… now

[Verse 1-1]

  • [22.92] Rappers, I monkey flip ‘em with the funky rhythm I be
  • [25.76] kickin’ / Musician, inflictin’ composition of
  • [28.6] pain / I’m like Scarface sniffin’ cocaine / Holding an
  • [31.44] M16, see with the pen I’m extreme, now

[Verse 1-2]

  • [34.28] Bullet holes left in my peepholes / I’m suited up in
  • [37.12] street clothes, hand me a 9 and I’ll defeat foes
  • [39.96] Y’all know my steelo with or without the airplay
  • [42.8] I keep some E&J, sitting bent up in the stairway / Or

[Verse 1-3]

  • [45.64] either on the corner betting Grants with the cee-lo champs
  • [48.48] Laughing at baseheads tryna sell some broken amps
  • [51.32] G-packs get off quick, forever niggas talk shit
  • [54.16] Reminiscing about the last time the task force flipped

[Verse 1-4]

  • [57.0] Niggas be running through the block shootin’ / Time to
  • [59.84] start the revolution, catch a body, head for Houston / Once they
  • [62.69] caught us off-guard / The MAC-10 was in the grass and
  • [65.53] I ran like a cheetah with thoughts of an assassin

[Verse 1-5]

  • [68.37] Picked the MAC up, told brothers, “Back up!” the MAC spit
  • [71.21] Lead was hittin’ niggas, one ran – I made him backflip
  • [74.05] Heard a few chicks scream, my arm shook, couldn’t look
  • [76.89] Gave another squeeze, heard it click, “Yo, my shit is stuck”

[Verse 1-6]

  • [79.73] Try to cock it, it wouldn’t shoot, now I’m in danger
  • [82.57] Finally pulled it back / And saw three bullets caught up in the chamber
  • [85.41] So now I’m jetting to the building lobby, and it was
  • [88.25] full of children probably, couldn’t see as high as I be (So what you sayin’?)

[Verse 1-7]

  • [91.09] It’s like the game ain’t the same / Got younger
  • [93.93] niggas pulling the triggers / Bringing fame to their name / And
  • [96.77] claim some corners, crews without guns are goners / In
  • [99.61] broad daylight, stickup kids, they run up on us

[Verse 1-8]

  • [102.45] 45’s and gauges, MAC’s, in fact / Same
  • [105.29] niggas will catch you back-to-back / Snatching your cracks in black
  • [108.13] There was a snitch on the block getting niggas knocked
  • [110.97] So hold your stash ‘til the coke price drop / I know this

[Verse 1-9]

  • [113.81] crackhead who said she got to smoke nice rock / And if it’s
  • [116.65] good, she’ll bring you customers in measuring pots / But yo,
  • [119.49] you gotta slide on a vacation, inside infor-
  • [122.33] mation / Keeps large niggas erasin’ and their wives basin’

[Verse 1-10]

  • [125.17] It drops deep as it does in my breath / I never
  • [128.01] sleep, (huh) ‘cause sleep is the cousin of death / Beyond the
  • [130.85] walls of intelligence, life is defined / I think of
  • [133.69] crime when I’m in a New York state of mind

[Hook]

  • [136.53] New York state of mind
  • [139.37] New York state of mind
  • [142.21] New York state of mind
  • [145.05] New York state of mind / Be having dreams that I’m a

[Verse 2-1]

  • [147.89] gangsta / Drinking Moets, holding TEC’s
  • [150.73] Making sure the cash came correct, then I stepped
  • [153.57] Investments in stocks, sewing up the blocks to
  • [156.41] sell rocks / Winning gunfights with mega-cops / But just a

[Verse 2-2]

  • [159.25] nigga walking with his finger on the trigger
  • [162.09] Make enough figures until my pockets get bigger
  • [164.93] I ain’t the type of brother made for you to start testin’
  • [167.77] Give me a Smith & Wesson, I have niggas undressin’

[Verse 2-3]

  • [170.61] Thinking of cash flow, buddha and shelter
  • [173.45] Whenever frustrated, I’m a hijack Delta / In the
  • [176.29] PJ’s, my blend tape plays, bullets are strays
  • [179.13] Young bitches is grazed, each block is like a maze / Full of

[Verse 2-4]

  • [181.98] black rats trapped plus the Island is packed / From what I
  • [184.82] hear in all the stories / When my peoples come back, black
  • [187.66] I’m living where the nights is jet-black / The fiends fight to
  • [190.5] get crack / I just max, I dream I can sit back

[Verse 2-5]

  • [193.34] And lamp like Capone, with drug scripts sewn / Or the
  • [196.18] legal luxury life, rings flooded with stones, holmes
  • [199.02] I got so many rhymes, I don’t think I’m too sane / Life is
  • [201.86] parallel to Hell, but I must maintain / And be

[Verse 2-6]

  • [204.7] prosperous, though we live dangerous / Cops could just
  • [207.54] arrest me, blaming us / We’re held like hostages
  • [210.38] It’s only right that I was born to use mics / And the
  • [213.22] stuff that I write is even tougher than dykes / I’ve taken

[Verse 2-6]

  • [216.06] rappers to a new plateau, through rap slow
  • [218.9] My rhymin’ is a vitamin held without a capsule
  • [221.74] The smooth criminal on beat breaks / Never
  • [224.58] put me in your box if your shit eats tapes / The city

[Verse 2-7]

  • [227.42] never sleeps, full of villains and creeps / That’s where
  • [230.26] I learned to do my hustle / Had to scuffle with freaks / I’m an
  • [233.1] addict for sneakers / 20’s of buddha and bitches with beepers
  • [235.94] In the streets I can greet ya, about blunts I teach ya

[Verse 2-8]

  • [238.78] Inhale deep like the words of my breath
  • [241.62] I never sleep, ‘cause sleep is the cousin of death / I lay
  • [244.46] puzzle as I backtrack to earlier times / Nothing’s
  • [247.3] equivalent to the New York state of mind

[Hook]

  • [250.14] New York state of mind
  • [252.98] New York state of mind
  • [255.82] New York state of mind
  • [258.66] New York state of mind

item.title: Worst Comes to Worst
